channel.title: Help saving + loading from MYSQL server?
channel.description:
Hello, i have had a server running for a while now and i was wanting to update it so that i can load and save characters to and from a MYSQL server. I have seen this tutorial before but it is for a 508 and i really want it for a 317 Delta source. so if any one knows roughly how to do this or can give an idea of what file to edit and what part please REPLY TO THIS TOPIC!!! lol
Thanks!

item.title: Help saving + loading from MYSQL server?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.source: Help saving + loading from MYSQL server?
